lead_paragraph: Officer Wayne Isaacs’s gun and badge were taken away by the Police Department as an investigation continued into his encounter with Delrawn Small on July 4.

headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Officer Who Fatally Shot Man in a Traffic Dispute Is Put on Modified Duty
headline.main: Brooklyn Officer Who Fatally Shot Man Is Put on Modified Duty

snippet: Officer Wayne Isaacs’s gun and badge were taken away by the Police Department as an investigation continued into his encounter with Delrawn Small on July 4....
abstract: New York City Police Officer Wayne Isaacs, who fatally shot Delrawn Small during Brooklyn traffic dispute, is placed on modified duty pending outcome of investigation into confrontation.

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Isaacs, Wayne (New York, NY, Police Officer)
